code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Column=_ref=>{let{title,cards,onAddCard,onDeleteCard,onRevealCard,onRevealAll,onDeleteAll,onLike,onDislike}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:title}),cards.map((card,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[card.revealed?card.content:'Texto mascarado, pague-me um caf√© pra liberar ‚òï',/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons",children:[!card.revealed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"reveal",onClick:()=>onRevealCard(index),children:"\uD83D\uDC41\uFE0F Revelar"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete",onClick:()=>onDeleteCard(index),children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F Apagar"})]}),card.userName&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["por: ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:card.userName})]}),card.revealed&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"like-dislike",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>onLike(index),children:["\uD83D\uDC4D Like (",card.likes||0,")"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>onDislike(index),children:["\uD83D\uDC4E Dislike (",card.dislikes||0,")"]})]})]},index)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"add",onClick:()=>{const content=prompt('Digite o conte√∫do do card:');if(content!==null)onAddCard(content);},children:"\u2795 Adicionar Card"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"reveal",onClick:onRevealAll,children:"\uD83D\uDC41\uFE0F Revelar Todos"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete",onClick:onDeleteAll,children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F Apagar Todos"})]})]});};export default Column;
